14678.「キヒヒヒ！\n また 来おったか エテーネの民よ！\n 今度こそ お前たちの:
Kee hee hee! Back again, are you?!
This time, you won't live to see another day!

14679.「時を超えるチカラを秘めた お前たちに\n テンスの花を渡すわけには いかんから:
You have the power to transcend time, so
there's no way I'm letting you get your hands
on these flowers!

14699.「アバさまが 乗っていいって\n 言ってくれたんだ！: Abba said I could ride with her!

14702.「村の守り神 カメさまの お背中に\n 乗せていただく日が 来ようとは……。\n:
I never thought I'd see the day when I could
ride atop the Galapagod, our guardian deity...
It pays to live a long life.

14703.「さあ 行くぞ <kyodai>。\n 他の者たちも 乗せてやらねば。:
Let's get going, <kyodai>.
We need to let the others ride, too.

14705.<if_woman>「さあ！ 姉ちゃんも 乗って乗って！\n ほら おいらの手に:
Come on, <if_woman>sis<else>bro<endif>! Get on, get on!
Here, take my hand...

14716.「おや まだ寝てたのかい？\n あんたにしちゃ めずらしいね。:
Oh, still asleep, huh?
That's not like you.

14717.「そうだ！ それより 聞いておくれよ！\n その <kyodai>がね！:
Oh, right! Listen up!
It's about <kyodai>!

14718.「錬金術で ハツラツ豆を\n １０倍に増やすって言ったのに 失敗して\n 全部:
They said they were going to use alchemy to
increase our crop of Pep Beans tenfold, but
they failed and all the beans turned to ash!

14719.「今年最後の ハツラツ豆を……。\n アバさまが とーっても\n 楽しみにしてら:
The last of this year's Pep Beans...
Abba's been looking forward to them sooo
much... It's just awful, isn't it?

14720.「あんたの <kyodai_rel2>の失敗なんだから\n 代わりに アバさまに:
And it's YOUR <kyodai_rel2>'s fault, so
you need to go apologize to Abba in their
stead.

14721.「言うまでもないけど アバさまの家は\n 橋向こうの高台にある 大きな家だからね:
Not that I need to tell you, but Abba's house
is the big house on the hill over the bridge.
Now, off you go!

14751.「シンイっ！\n やっと眠れそうなところだったのに\n よくも くだらんことで:
Shini!
Just as I was about to get some sleep, here
you come barging in with this nonsense!!

14752.「す すみません……。\n じつは ハツラツ豆が なくなってしまったので\n そ:
S-sorry...
Actually, I was hoping to replace the Pep
Beans we ran out of, but...

14758.「豆が どうのなどと\n 言っておられる時では ないわ！: Now is not the time to be talking about beans!

14759.「おお <pc>ではないか！\n ちょうどよいところに 来てくれたな。\n じつ:
Oh! Well, if it isn't <pc>!
How nice that you're here. Actually, there's
something I need to talk to you about...

14760.「……と <kyodai>は 一緒ではないのか？\n やれやれ。どうでもいい時に:
...<kyodai>'s not with you? Honestly...
They show up when I don't need them, but when
I DO need them, they're nowhere to be found.

14761.「すまぬが <kyodai>を 呼んできてくれ。\n お前たち<pc_rel3>:
I'm sorry, but you'll need to go get
<kyodai>. There's something I need to
tell you all together.

14764.「ありがとうございます！\n では 失礼して……\n さっそく 作らせていただき:
Thank you so much!
Then, if you'll excuse me...
I'll get started right away.

14765.「<pc>さんは\n ご存知なかったかもしれませんが……。\n じつは 私……:
I don't know if you knew this, but...I'm
actually...pretty good at sewing.

14766.「おばあさまの服も\n いつも 私が作っているんですよ。:
I always make my grandmother's clothes for
her.

14768.「ほら！ 香りも 肌ざわりも 申し分ない。\n 最高の安眠まくらの 完成です！:
Have a look! The texture, the aroma...it's all
just right. The perfect pillow for a good
night's sleep!

14769.「<pc>さんが 集めてくださった\n もみガラと お茶の葉の効果で\n おばあ:
Those Fluffy Rice Husks and Dried Antidotal
Herbs you collected are going to help her
sleep much more soundly!

14770.「さあ！ さっそく おばあさまに\n 使っていただきましょう！\n 一緒に 向か:
Come on! Let's give it to her right now!
Follow me, her room's on the opposite side
of the house!

14771.「これと これも 入れて……\n フタを閉めて……。:
Put this here, and that there...
Close the lid...

14772.「よーし……。\n 今度こそ すっごいのが できるぞ。\n きっと……。:
Alright...
It's gonna be great this time.
I'm sure of it...

14775.「やったあっ！\n なんか すっごいの できた！:
Yes! I did it!
I've really outdone myself this time!

14776.<if_woman>「あれっ 姉ちゃん？<else>「あれっ 兄ちゃん？<end: <if_woman>Is that you, sis?<else>Is that you, bro?<endif>

14777.<if_woman>「いいところに来たね！\n これ…… 姉ちゃんに プレゼント:
Perfect timing!
Look, I made a present for you!
I really think you're going to like it!

14779.「あれ？ かばんが いっぱいだね。\n しょうがないから おいらが 持っておくよ:
Huh? Your bag's full...
Oh well. I'll hang onto it for you.

14780.<if_woman>「で 姉ちゃんは こんな所まで\n わざわざ なにしに来たの:
So, what did you come all the way out here
for, anyway?

14783.「それって ついに アバさまが\n おいらの錬金術を 頼りにする日が\n 来たっ:
So the day's finally come.
At long last, Abba has no choice but to
rely on my alchemy!!

14784.<if_woman>「さあ 姉ちゃん！\n アバさまの所へ 行こう～！ おいらが:
Come on, <if_woman>sis<else>bro<endif>!
Let's get back to Abba's!
And don't forget the hat I made for you!

14831.「<pc>さん。私が 起こしますよ。\n 寝起きの おばあさまは 機嫌が悪いので:
Let me be the one to wake her,
<pc>. Grandmother is always in a
bad mood when she first wakes...

14832.「失礼します おばあさま。\n <pc>さんが <kyodai>さんを\n 連れ:
Excuse me, Grandmother.
<pc> brought <kyodai> back
with them.

14837.「……おかげで 寝覚めも よかった。\n なかなか いい まくらじゃったぞい。:
Thanks to that pillow you made, I slept like
a baby. It's very well-made.

14840.「では シンイ！ 村の者たちを集めよ！\n これより カメさまのお告げを 皆に伝:
Now, Shini! Gather the villagers! I will
now reveal to them what the Galapagod has told
me!

14842.「エテーネの民たちよ！\n 心して 聞くがよい！: People of Ethene! Listen to me carefully!

14843.「わしは カメさまからの お告げをたまわる\n 巫女として 託された お告げを\:
As the priestess responsible for receiving
omens from the Galapagod, I will now tell
you what he has told me!

14844.「まもなく このエテーネの村は……: Soon, the village of Ethene will be...

14845.「大いなる災厄に見舞われ 滅びる！\n エテーネの民は ひとり残らず\n 死に絶:
...destroyed by a great calamity! Every last
person in this village will die!

14849.「エテーネの民は 死に絶えるだろう……\n だが 光明が 残されていないわけでは:
The people of Ethene will all die...
However, there is still a light of hope left!

14850.「北の 清き水の洞くつに咲く 伝説の霊草\n テンスの花があれば 滅びの運命から:
To the north, in the Clearwater Cave, grows
a legendary flower called the Tens Flower.
With it, we can escape this horrible fate!

14854.「テンスの花を 採りにいくのは\n わしの孫のシンイと <pc>！:
<pc> and my grandson Shini will go
and collect the Tens Flowers!

14855.「そして……<kyodai>！\n この ３名じゃ！:
And... <kyodai> as well!
The three of you!

14856.「大いなる災厄は そこまで迫っておる！\n だが わしも チカラを尽くす！:
A great calamity is upon us! But I will do
everything in my power!

14857.「このわしが カメさまと共に\n エテーネの村を 守りきってみせるわ！！:
The Galapagod and I will defend Ethene
Village!

14869.「さあ 急ぎましょう！ 清き水の洞くつは\n 育みの大地よりも はるか遠い 北に:
We have to hurry! The Clearwater Cave is far
to the north past the Nurturing Land. Let's
pray at my house, then leave right away!

14902.<center>冥王のチカラにより\nあなたの命は尽きましたが その魂には\nま:
Your life has been cut short by the
Netherlord's power, but your soul yet has a
mission to fulfill.

14903.<center>隔絶された島で 生きてきた\nあなたたち エテーネの民は\n知ら:
You and the rest of the people of Ethene, who
lived on this isolated island, could never
have known...

14904.<center>これより ５人の神々が\nあなたに チカラを貸してくれます。:
From now on, the Five Gods will lend you their
strength...

14905.<center>さあ 神の像の前にゆき\nどの姿に生まれ変わるか 決めるのです。:
Now, go before the images of the gods and
decide into which form you shall be reborn.

14917.<if_woman>「イヤだよ！ 姉ちゃん！！\n おいらを ひとりにしないで！: <if_woman>No! Sis! Please don't leave me!!<else>No! Bro! Please don't leave me!!<endif>

14923.「<pc>さん。\n テンスの花は 私が 命に代えても\n 必ず おばあさまに:
<pc>! I'll get the Tens Flower to
Grandmother, even if it costs me my life!

14925.「くっくっく…… 見たぞ！: Keh heh heh... I saw that!

14926.「こいつです 冥王さま！\n あの術を 使いやがったのはっ！:
It's this one, Netherlord! They're the one
that used that technique!

14927.「やはり 時渡りの術を使う者が 現れたか。:
I knew it. So, you've finally shown yourself,
time traveler...

14928.「だが ネズミ１匹 逃がしたところで\n この冥王ネルゲルを 阻むことはできぬ。:
But even if I let one little rat escape, I,
the Netherlord Nergel, cannot be stopped.

14929.「冥王とは あまねく 死を統べる者。\n 生きとし生ける者が 死から逃れられぬよ:
The Netherlord is he who commands dominion
over death. Just as no mortal being can escape
death, none shall escape me.

14930.「いまわしき 時渡りの術者よ！\n 灼熱の獄炎で その身を 焼き尽くしてやろう！:
O disgraceful traveler of time! I will burn
you to ashes in a hellish inferno!

14949.「<pc>か！？\n くそっ！ 余計なことすんじゃねえ！！\n オレと お前は:
<pc>?! Damn it! Don't be reckless!
We're supposed to be together, even in death!!

14950.「ちょっと！ <pc>！\n 勝手なことすんじゃないわよ！\n あんたを守るのは:
Wait! <pc>! Don't do this to me!
I'm the one who's supposed to protect you!!

14951.<if_woman>「イヤだよ！ お姉ちゃん！！\n 私を ひとりにしないで！！: <if_woman>No! Sis! Don't leave me alone!<else>No! Bro! Don't leave me alone!<endif>

14958.「おかしいですね。\n 魔物たちが １匹も いないなんて。:
That's strange.
There's not a single monster here.

14959.「ねえ 今 カミナリが落ちた方角って……。:
Hey, the direction that lightning struck just
now...

14960.「村の方角です！ 急ぎましょうっ！！: That's the village! We have to hurry!!

14961.「なあ 今 カミナリが落ちた方角って……。:
Hey, the direction that lightning struck just
now...

14962.「ねえ 今 カミナリが落ちた方角って……。:
Hey, the direction that lightning struck just
now...

14963.「い…今 カミナリが落ちた方角って……。:
Hey, the direction that lightning struck just
now...

14965.「じゃが…… たとえ この身が果てようとも\n 冥王さまより与えられし 使命だけ:
No matter what happens to me...I will still
fulfill the mission that the Netherlord gave
me!

14967.「冥王さま……！\n 時を 超える…… エテーネの民は……\n め…冥王さまの:
Oh, great Netherlord...!
May the time traveling people of Ethene...
be destroyed...by your hand!

14968.「ど どうしよう……。\n テンスの花が 全部 焼けちゃった……。:
What do we do now...?
He burned all the Tens Flowers...

14969.「時を超えるとかなんとか\n わけのわからないこと言って\n おいらたちの ジャ:
What's all this nonsense about "transcending
time"? What a nuisance that guy was...

14971.「私たち エテーネの民は はるか昔\n 自由に時を超えられる 時渡りの術という能:
Long ago, we, the people of Ethene, possessed
the ability to travel through time at will.

14972.「ですが 時渡りの術を使える者は\n 時代と共に 少なくなっていき\n 数百年前:
However, the number of people with that power
dwindled over time...and hundreds of years
ago, the ability was completely lost...

14973.「そうだったんだ……。\n 今はもうない能力なのに そのために\n こんな目にあ:
So then...we're being punished for an ability
we no longer have. It's not fair!

14974.「ダメだ…… 見つからない……。\n テンスの花が １本でも残っていれば\n お:
It's no use... I can't find any... If even one
was left, I could've fulfilled Grandmother's
wishes!

14975.「……仕方ありません。村に帰りましょう。\n 他に 大いなる災厄を止める手立てが:
...We did what we could. Let's return to the
village. Perhaps there are other ways to
prevent the disaster.

14983.「よくぞ 見つけてくださいました！\n これさえあれば 村を……\n 滅びの運命:
Great work! With this, we might be able to
save the village from destruction!

14984.「よかった。\n おいらも 役に立てたんだね！: Thank goodness. I'm glad I was able to help!

14985.<if_woman>「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが\n おいらの役目:
I'm sure it was my duty to find the Tens
Flower... Thanks for bringing me here!

14987.「さあ この花を\n おばあさまに 届けなくては！\n 急ぎましょう！:
Come on, we've got to hurry and get this
flower to Grandmother!

14988.「ど どうすんだ……。\n テンスの花が みんな 焼けちまったのか？:
Wh-what should we do...? Did all the Tens
Flowers really get burned?

14989.「ど どうすんのよ……。\n テンスの花が 全部 燃やされちゃったわよ！:
Wh-what should we do...? They've burned all
of the Tens Flowers!

14990.「ど どうしたらいいの……？\n テンスの花が 全部 燃えちゃった。:
Wh-what should we do...? All of the Tens
Flowers have burned up.

14991.「時を超えるとかなんとか\n わけのわからないことを言って\n オレたちの ジャ:
What's all this nonsense about "transcending
time"? What a nuisance he was...

14992.「時を超えるとかなんとか\n わけのわかんないこと言って\n あたしたちの ジャ:
What's all this nonsense about "transcending
time"? What a nuisance he was...

14993.「時を超えるとかなんとか\n わけのわからないこと言って 私たちの\n ジャマを:
What's all this about "transcending time",
anyway? What a weird thing to say...

14994.「そうだったのか……。\n 今はもうない能力なのに そのために\n こんな目にあ:
So then... why do we have to be put through
all this if we lost that power?

14995.「そうだったんだ……。\n 今はもうない能力なのに そのために\n こんな目にあ:
So then...if we've lost that power, why do
we have to go through all this?!

14996.「そうだったんだ……。\n 今はもうない能力なのに そのために\n こんな目にあ:
So then...it's a power we no longer have, and
we're being put through this anyways.

15006.「へっへ～ん。\n さすが オレだぜ！: Heh heh... Leave it to me!

15007.「ふふん！\n みんな あたしに感謝してよねっ！: Hmph! You all should be thanking me!

15008.「えへへへ……。\n 私も 役に立てて うれしいな～！: Ehehe... I'm glad that I could help, too!

15009.「たぶん ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが\n オレの役目だったのかもな！ <p:
Maybe it really was my duty to come here and
find the Tens Flower...<pc>, thanks
for bringing me here!

15010.「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが\n あたしの役目だったのね。<pc>:
I guess my role in all this was to find the
Tens Flower here. <pc>, thank you
for bringing me along!

15011.<if_woman>「きっと ここで テンスの花を見つけるのが\n 私の役目だっ:
I'm sure it was my duty to find the Tens
Flowers here. Thank you for bringing me
here!

15012.「ここです。\n テンスの花は この扉の向こうに咲いていると\n 書物に 記され:
This is the place. I've read that the Tens
Flowers bloom behind this door.

15013.「最後に この扉が開かれたのは\n いったい いつのことか\n 私には 想像もつ:
I can't imagine how long it's been since this
door was last opened...

15014.「この洞くつに流れる 清き水が 今も\n テンスの花を 育み続けてくれているはず:
I'm sure that the clear water flowing through
this cave is nurturing the Tens Flowers even
now.

15018.「いまわしき テンスの花は\n この魔導鬼ベドラーさまが\n すべて 焼き尽くし:
All of the Tens Flowers will be burned to ash
by me, the great Sorcerer Bedora!

15021.「キヒヒヒ！ お前らは エテーネの民か！:
Kee-hee-hee! You're all from Ethene, aren't
you?

15023.「じゃが そうはいかんぞ！\n 時を超えるチカラを秘めた お前たちに\n この花:
But that's not going to happen! You have the
power to transcend time, so I can't let you
have these flowers!

15025.「<pc>さん……。\n やはり…… お話ししておきます。:
<pc>...
There's something...I need to tell you.

15026.「じつは おばあさまが 気になることを\n つぶやいていらっしゃったのです。:
The truth is, I heard Grandmother whispering
something that's been bothering me.

15028.「たとえ 滅亡の運命から\n 逃れることが できたとしても……: Even if we do escape our fate of extinction...

15031.「ひとりって…… それって……\n 他の人は みんな 死んじゃうってこと？:
Just one person... does that mean....
Everyone else is going to die?

15032.「それは 私にも わかりませんが\n 言葉のままに 受け取るなら\n そういうこ:
I don't know exactly what she meant, but if
you take it at face value, then that would
be the case, I think.

15034.「気を落とさないでください。\n ……おそらく おばあさまは\n 最悪の場合のこ:
Don't lose hope. Perhaps Grandmother was only
referring to the worst-case scenario.

15035.「カメさまの お告げどおり\n テンスの花さえあれば 村は助かるとも\n おばあ:
The Galapagod told Grandmother that if we
bring back the Tens Flowers, the village
will be saved.

15036.「だから 今は おばあさまの言葉を信じて\n 必ず テンスの花を 村へ持ちかえり:
So for now, let's believe in her words and
bring the flowers back to the village!

15037.「そうだよね……！ おいらも信じる！\n テンスの花さえあれば\n みんな助かる:
That's right...! I believe it, too! As long
as we get the Tens Flowers, we can save
everyone!

15044.「ひとりって…… それって……\n 他のヤツは みんな 死んじまうってことか？:
Just one person... does that mean....
Everyone else is going to die?

15045.「ひとりって…… それって……\n 他の人は みんな 死んじゃうってことなの？:
Just one person... does that mean....
Everyone else is going to die?

15046.「ひとりって…… それって……\n 他の人は みんな 死んじゃうってこと？:
Just one person... does that mean....
Everyone else is going to die?

15050.「そうだよな……！ オレも信じる！\n テンスの花さえあれば\n みんな助かるっ:
That's right...! I believe it, too! As long
as we get the Tens Flowers, we can save
everyone!

15051.「そうよね……！ あたしも信じるわ！\n テンスの花さえあれば\n みんな助かる:
That's right...! I believe it, too! As long
as we get the Tens Flowers, we can save
everyone!

15052.「そうだよね……！ 私も信じる！\n テンスの花さえあれば\n みんな助かるって:
That's right...! I believe it, too! As long
as we get the Tens Flowers, we can save
everyone!

15053.<pc>は\n岩に 刻まれている文字を 読んだ。:
<pc> read the words carved into the
rock.

15054.<center>この世界で 平和に 暮らしていた\nすべての 生きとし生ける者は:
All living beings, who until now had lived
peacefully in this world, are now faced with
extinction.

15055.<center>今 空には ふたつの太陽が 昇っている。\nふたつめの太陽……:
Two suns now rise in the sky. The second sun
has made this world a living hell since it
appeared...

15056.<center>いまわしき ふたつめの太陽は 自在に空を駆け\n大地を焼き 海を:
The horrible second sun races across the sky,
scorching the earth, drying the seas, and
sending all peoples into a searing despair.

15057.<center>太陽が ふたつになった理由など 知る由もない。\nわかっているこ:
No one knows where the second sun came from.
All we know is that all life on this world
will soon perish.

15058.「こんな所にも いしずえの森と同じような\n 壁画があったのですね。:
I didn't know about this mural. It's just like
the one in Cornerstone Forest.

15060.「……私は 以前から\n いしずえの森の岩に 描かれていた絵を\n 不思議な気持:
...For a long time, I've looked at the murals
on the rocks in Cornerstone Forest with a
sense of wonder.

15061.「人間以外の種族が 本当にいたのだとしたら\n 彼らは どこに行ってしまったのだ:
If there really were species other than
humans, I wonder where they've gone...

15062.「もしかしたら ここに書かれているとおり\n ほとんどの者たちが滅亡し…… 私た:
Perhaps, as it says here, most of them
perished...and we humans were the only ones
who survived.

15067.「これと これも 入れるだろ……\n んで フタを閉めて……。:
I'll put this in, and this too...then close
the lid...

15068.「これと これも 入れて……\n フタを閉めるでしょ……。:
I'll put this in, and this too...then close
the lid...

15069.「これと これも 入れて……\n フタを閉めて……。:
Put this here, and that there...
Close the lid...

15070.「よーし……。\n 今度こそ すっげえのが できるぜ。\n たぶんよ……！:
Alright... This time, I'm really going to make
something amazing. Here's hoping...!

15071.「うーん……。\n 今度こそ すっごいのが できそうなんだけど。\n たぶん……:
Hmm... I think this one is gonna turn out
great. Maybe...

15072.「よーし……。\n 今度こそ すっごいのが できちゃうよ。\n きっと……。:
Okay... This time I'm going to make
something amazing. I'm sure of it...

15073.「よっしゃあっ！\n ホントに すっげえのが できたぜっ！: Oh yeah! I've made something REALLY awesome!

15074.「やったあっ！\n なんか すっごいの できちゃった！: I did it! I really did it!

15075.「やったあっ！\n なんか すっごいのが できたよ～！: I did it! I've really made something amazing!

15079.「ちょうど いいところに来たな！\n ほらよっ！ お前に プレゼントだ！\n 絶:
Nice to see you! Look! I have something for
you! I think you'll like it!

15080.「いいところに来たわね！\n これ…… <pc>に あげるわ。\n きっと 似合:
Perfect timing! This is for you,
<pc>! I think you'll look great in
it!

15081.<if_woman>「いいところに来たね～！\n これ…… お姉ちゃんに プレゼ:
Perfect timing! It's a present just for you!
You'll look great in it!

15082.「えーっ かばんが いっぱいなのかよ。\n しょうがねえなあ。オレが 持っといて:
Huh? Your bag is full? Oh well. I'll hang onto
it for you for now.

15083.「ちょっと！ かばんが いっぱいじゃないの。\n しょうがないわね。あたしが 持:
Wait! Your bag's full. Oh well. I'll take it
off your hands for now!

15084.「あれ？ かばんが いっぱいなの？\n じゃあ 私が 持っててあげるね！:
Huh? Your bag's full? In that case, I'll hold
onto it for you.

15085.「で <pc>は こんな所まで\n なにしに来たんだ？: So then, what are you doing here?

15086.「で <pc>は こんな所まで\n わざわざ なにしに来たってわけ？:
So what are you doing all the way out here,
anyway?

15087.<if_woman>「で お姉ちゃんは こんな所まで来て\n なんの用事？<el: So, how come you came all the way out here?

15094.「それって ついに アバさまが\n オレの錬金術を 頼りにする日が\n 来たって:
So that means the day has finally come for
Abba to rely on my alchemy, huh?!

15095.「それって ついに アバさまが\n あたしの錬金術を 頼りにする日が\n 来たっ:
So that means the day has finally come for
Abba to rely on my alchemy?!

15096.「それって ついに アバさまが\n 私の錬金術を 頼りにする日が\n 来たってこ:
Does that mean the day has finally come for
Abba to rely on my alchemy!?

15097.「さあ <pc>！\n アバさまの所へ 行こうぜ～！ オレが作った\n ぼうしの:
<pc>! Let's go to Abba's! And don't
you forget the hat I made for you!

15098.「さあ <pc>！\n アバさまの所へ 行くわよっ！ あたしが作った\n ぼうし:
Come on, then! We're going to Abba's! And
don't forget about the hat I made for you!

15099.<if_woman>「さあ お姉ちゃん！\n アバさまの所へ 連れてって～！ 私:
Come on! Let's go see Abba right now!
...And don't forget the hat I made for you!

15110.「まったく！\n <kyodai>は 逃げ足だけは速いんだから。:
Jeez! <kyodai> sure is a fast
runner.

15117.「アバさまが 乗っていいって\n 言ってくれたんだぜ！: Abba said I could ride with her!

15118.「アバさまが 乗っていいって\n 言ってくれたのよ！: Abba said I could ride with her!

15119.「アバさまが 乗っていいって\n 言ってくれたんだ～。: Abba said I could ride with her!

15126.「おら！ <pc>も 乗りな乗りな！\n ほら オレの手に つかまって……:
Come on, <pc>! Get on, get on!
Here, take my hand...

15127.「さあ！ <pc>も 乗って乗って！\n ほら あたしの手に つかまって……:
Come on, <pc>! Get on, get on!
Here, take my hand...

15128.<if_woman>「ねえ！ お姉ちゃんも 乗って乗って！\n ほら 私の手に:
Hey, come on! Get on, get on!
Here, take my hand...

15141.「さよう。テンスの花は われらが 一度も\n 足を踏み入れたことのない秘境に咲く:
Of course. The Tens Flowers bloom in a hidden
location where none of you have ever set foot.
Therefore, I will decide who will pick them!

15145.「なぜ…… 魔物が 入ってきた……。\n 魔物たちの目から村を隠す わしの結界は:
Why...did a monster get in...? What happened
to my barrier that hides this village from the
monsters' sight...?

15147.「皆さん 落ち着いてください！\n すぐに私たちが テンスの花を採ってきます！:
Everyone, please calm down!
We'll go and get the Tens Flowers right away!

15151.「なるほど！ 危機を察して\n この花を 採りにきたというわけじゃな！？:
I see! So you've come to collect these
flowers in your hour of need, is that it?!

15153.「キーッヒッヒッヒ！ やっぱりそうか！\n こんな大切なことを 忘れ去ってしまう:
Kee-hee-hee! I knew it! Ethene's people
really are stupid enough to forget something
so important!

15154.「だが 忘れていようがいまいが 関係ない！\n エテーネの民は 皆殺しじゃあっ！:
But it doesn't matter whether or not you
forgot! Everyone in Ethene will die!!

15155.「ああぁ……\n 今年最後の ハツラツ豆がぁ……。: Ohh... the last of this year's Pep Beans...

23013.「わしは それまで 休ませてもらうからな。\n シンイよ！ 今度は わしの眠りを:
Until then, I plan on getting some rest.
And Shini! Try not to disturb my sleep this
time!

24626.「な…なんなんですか そのお告げは……。\n カメさまは 私たちを見捨てるのです:
W...what kind of omen is that...? Is the
Galapagod abandoning us?!

24628.「でも テンスの花なんて 聞いたことないわ。:
But...I've never even heard of a Tens Flower
before.

24630.「よかった…… 安心していいんだねえ。: Thank goodness... I can rest easy now.

24632.「魔物が…… 魔物が 村に入ってきた……！:
A monster...a monster has entered the
village...!

24633.「……オレたち どうなっちまうんだ？\n アバさまは 大丈夫だって言ってたけど\:
...What's going to happen to us? Abba said
we'd be okay, but maybe she was right about
our destruction after all...

24634.「そうだよ。\n アバさまの結界が 破られるなんて……。:
You're right. I can't believe the barrier was
broken...

29471.<center><pc>よ。\nその姿を 選んだのですね。:
<pc>.
So, this is the form you have chosen.

29472.<if_woman><center>不運にも 今日\nこの世を去った <pc_r:
<if_woman>There is a young <pc_race> woman who
unfortunately passed away today.<else>There is a young <pc_race> man who
unfortunately passed away today.<endif>

29473.<if_woman><center>あなたは今日から その女性の身体を借り\n新:
<if_woman>From this day forth, you shall assume the body
of this young woman and begin a new life.<else>From this day forth, you shall assume the body
of this young man and begin a new life.<endif>

29475.<center>さあ この新しい冒険の書を お持ちなさい。: Now, take this Adventure Log with you.

29477.<center>神は その書を持つ あなたの行いを\n常に見ています。教会で祈ら:
With that book, the gods will always watch
over your actions. Even if you don't pray at a
church, everything shall be recorded there.

29478.<center>そして 探すのです。\nあなたの使命を。\n生まれ変わることの意:
Seek out your mission. Discover the
purpose of your rebirth...

31661.「やっぱり ダメだったじゃないか！\n どうしてくれるんだい！！:
I knew it wouldn't work! What do you think
you're doing?!

39112.<center>あなたたちの島の外には\nアストルティアと呼ばれる 広大で偉大な:
Outside your island lies a vast and grand
world known as Astoltia...

39113.<center>そこには あなたたち人間の他に\nさまざまな姿をした種族が\n今:
There exist other races besides you humans
that yet still live there...

39114.<center>さあ お行きなさい。\n母なる大地 アストルティアへ。: Now, go. To the wondrous world of Astoltia.

43975.「……なんだって？ <kyodai>と アバさまが\n カメさまに乗っている夢を:
...What's that? You dreamt that <kyodai>
and Abba were riding on the Galapagod? No way.
That could never happen.

46656.<if_woman><center>不運にも 今日\nこの世を去った オーガの女:
<if_woman>There is a young Ogre woman
who unfortunately passed on this day.<else>There is a young Ogre man
who unfortunately passed on this day.<endif>

46657.<if_woman><center>不運にも 今日\nこの世を去った エルフの女:
<if_woman>There is a young Elf woman
who unfortunately passed on this day.<else>There is a young Elf man
who unfortunately passed on this day.<endif>

46658.<if_woman><center>不運にも 今日\nこの世を去った プクリポの:
<if_woman>There is a young Pukulipo woman
who unfortunately passed on this day.<else>There is a young Pukulipo man
who unfortunately passed on this day.<endif>

46659.<if_woman><center>不運にも 今日\nこの世を去った ウェディの:
<if_woman>There is a young Weddie woman
who unfortunately passed on this day.<else>There is a young Weddie man
who unfortunately passed on this day.<endif>

46660.<if_woman><center>不運にも 今日\nこの世を去った ドワーフの:
